headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Heist Month Kicks Off with Double Rewards on all Five Original Heists
content:
The next four weeks mark a celebration of GTA Online’s Heists, kicking off with the scores that started it all.

Everyone will earn Double Rewards on the entire original crop of Heists released in GTA Online — The Fleeca Job, Prison Break, Humane Labs Raid, Series A Funding, and The Pacific Standard Job.

Completing all the Heist Finales for Prison Break, Humane Labs Raid, Series A Funding, and The Pacific Standard Job this week will get you an additional lump-sum payment of GTA$500K.
